item.title: Indian Mobile scene and future ....
item.description: As you know the growth of mobile is one of BIG discussion point of any technology seminar or talk show you attend today. Everybody already predicting more and more people will use mobile to access internet/information/e-commerce compared to traditional desktop or laptop. And in a country like India there will be lots of users who will be “on-line” for the first time and they will directly use a smart phone bypassing key-board and mice altogether, in numbers they might be larger than some European country.
